parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the passive shoulder restraint system can lead to inadequate protection of the driver and passengers in the event of an accident, increasing the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: The driver's side seatbelt will not lock
the driver's side seatbelt will not close on the shoulder harness
the passenger side shoulder harness will not retract to secure the passenger
the lap belt motors are not retracting
the belt or shoulder belt motor are not tightening
the cable appears to have come off its track and is hanging loose
the passive restraint system tightens without warning
the passive restraint system stops midway
warning lights and beeps intermittently even when belts are fastened.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A transmission fluid leak can cause vibration, jerking, and hesitation, which can lead to loss of control, accidents, or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Transmission fluid leak
vibration at idle
jerking
hesitation
difficulty shifting into gear
inability to shift into reverse or forward.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission slipping or hesitation can cause loss of power, difficulty shifting, and accidents, which can lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Intermittent hesitation
difficulty shifting into gear
inability to shift into reverse or forward
vehicle "chokes up" or stalls
loss of power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the parking brake warning light can cause the driver to unknowingly drive with the parking brake applied, leading to premature wear on the brake components, overheating, and potentially causing a loss of control or accident.
symptoms: The parking brake warning light on the instrument panel does not illuminate when the parking brake is applied
the driver is unaware that the parking brake is applied
the vehicle is driven with the parking brake applied
unusual brake noise or odor.
